alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 11:55AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Geneva, southwestern Houston, western Jackson, northwestern Bay, southeastern Walton, Holmes and Washington Counties through 200 PM EDT/100 PM CDT/... At 1254 PM EDT/1154 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Geneva to 11 miles east of De Funiak Springs to 12 miles northeast of Santa Rosa Beach. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lynn Haven, Vernon, Bonifay, Geneva, Chipley, Graceville, Dothan, Hartford, Taylor, Slocomb, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Live Oak, Freeport, Malvern, Rehobeth, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Wausau and Esto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
